subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Benny Feilhaber, a 21-year-old American midfielder, has started six straight games for Hamburg and is making it increasingly difficult for Coach Thomas Doll to drop him from the starting 11.
snippet: Benny Feilhaber, a 21-year-old American midfielder, has started six straight games for Hamburg and is making it increasingly difficult for Coach Thomas Doll to drop him from the starting 11.
